about_the_game: This demo contains the first three worlds of Blade Bounce, as well as some Bonus levels to sink your teeth into. It has precision platforming, casual and speedrun friendly design, and is overall a tightly designed platformer.
detailed_description: This demo contains the first three worlds of Blade Bounce, as well as some Bonus levels to sink your teeth into. It has precision platforming, casual and speedrun friendly design, and is overall a tightly designed platformer.
